story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2022, ShopSphere began as a small digital storefront with a bold mission: make e-commerce smarter, faster, and more customer-focused. Today, we serve millions across the region with a seamless online shopping experience.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: We aim to empower customers with a reliable, efficient, and enjoyable way to shop online. From product discovery to doorstep delivery, we focus on making every step simple and satisfying.

values.title: Core Values

growth.title: Growth & Impact
growth.content: With over 10,000 verified vendors and 1M+ SKUs, weâ€™re a hub for small businesses and large brands alike. In 2024 alone, we shipped over 3 million orders across 7 countries.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.content: Our diverse team of developers, designers, logistics experts, and customer support professionals work together every day to build something meaningful. Want to be part of it?

faqs.question: How can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Once your order is shipped, youâ€™ll receive an email with the tracking number and a link to track it.

faqs.question: What is your return policy?
faqs.answer: You can return any item within 14 days of receiving it. Please check our Return Policy page for more.

faqs.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries. Shipping fees and times may vary depending on the destination.

faqs.question: Can I change or cancel my order?
faqs.answer: You can request changes within 1 hour after placing the order. Please contact our support ASAP.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, and Cash on Delivery (in selected regions).
